fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Itinerary

Class ShortestPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.Group52_Project_IS1220_part1_AVEROUS_TOPUZ.Model.Itinerary.ShortestPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathPreference

    public class ShortestPath
extends java.lang.Object
implements PathPreference
    This class corresponds to a preference of the user within a ride to go from point A to point B using not the fastest, but the shortest path available
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre Averous, Nicolas Topuz

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor for an instance of the FastestPath strategy.

      Station[] departureAndArrival()

      Getter for Arrival station of the path.

      Getter for Departure station of the path.
      Station[] getDepartureAndArrival()
      Getter for Departure and Arrival stations of the optimized ride, in a size 2 array. in position [0] is departure Station, position [1] is arrival Station.

      Getter for minimal ride duration with an electrical bike.

      Getter for the ride in which the path has to be calculated.

      A method to update the arrival station of the ride, in case the last parkingslots at this station are taken by another user during the ride

      Setter for the departureAndArrival array, containing departure and arrival Station objects of the ride.

    • Method Detail

      • departureAndArrival

        public Station[] departureAndArrival()
        Description copied from interface: PathPreference
        Most important method of this interface : it computes the departure and arrival Stations for the given ride. In this case, depending on the user's preference for the ride.

        This method also updates the ride durations for electrical and mechanical biking, contained in the variables electricalRideDuration and mechanicalRideDuration.

        Specified by:
        departureAndArrival in interface PathPreference
        Returns:
        departureAndArrival A Station[] Object, containing in position 0 the departure Station, and in position 1 the arrival Station.

      • getUpdateOnArrivalStation

        public Station getUpdateOnArrivalStation(GPScoordinates departure)
        Description copied from interface: PathPreference
        A method to update the arrival station of the ride, in case the last parkingslots at this station are taken by another user during the ride
        Specified by:
        getUpdateOnArrivalStation in interface PathPreference
        Parameters:
        departure - GPScoordinates of the new start of the ride
        Returns:
        the Station to which the user should go to deposit his bike

      • getMechanicalRideDuration

        public double getMechanicalRideDuration()
        Getter for minimal ride duration with a mechanical bike.
        Returns:
        the minimal ride duration as a double.

      • getElectricalRideDuration

        public double getElectricalRideDuration()
        Getter for minimal ride duration with an electrical bike.
        Returns:
        the minimal ride duration as a double.

      • getDepartureAndArrival

        public Station[] getDepartureAndArrival()
        Getter for Departure and Arrival stations of the optimized ride, in a size 2 array. in position [0] is departure Station, position [1] is arrival Station.
        Specified by:
        getDepartureAndArrival in interface PathPreference
        Returns:
        the departure and arrival stations as a size 2 array.

      • getRide

        public Ride getRide()
        Getter for the ride in which the path has to be calculated.
        Returns:
        the Ride object in which the path is calculated.

      • getDeparture

        public Station getDeparture()
        Getter for Departure station of the path.
        Returns:
        The departure Station of the path.

      • getArrival

        public Station getArrival()
        Getter for Arrival station of the path.
        Returns:
        The arrival Station of the path.

      • setRide

        public void setRide(Ride ride)
        Setter for the ride in which the path is calculated. This method also updates the departureAndArrival variable, so that it matches with the ride.
        Specified by:
        setRide in interface PathPreference
        Parameters:
        ride - The ride that is to be calculated.

      • setDepartureAndArrival

        public void setDepartureAndArrival(Station[] departureAndArrival)
        Setter for the departureAndArrival array, containing departure and arrival Station objects of the ride.
        Parameters:
        departureAndArrival - a Station array of size 2 containing departure and arrival station.
